::Proto/Grimmler/Rex/Firearm::

Dracona's shot hits the shields of the Cybertronian Fire, the defences 
swirling around. Two laser batteries fire at Dracona, the other two at 
Twister. Two missile launchers fire, a signature-seeking missile heading for 
each Dracona and Twister.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto and Grimmles jump to their feet as the bridge comps report an attack, 
taking off down the corridors toward the exit, their guns ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex enters the brig, looking at Firearm. "My shift."

Firearm nods, spinning around as his comm-link beeps, Proto's voice yelling 
at him about an attack. Firearm's eyes light up. Battle! The bot takes off 
running down a corridor.
